content:
Just wanted to give a quick plug for our talk at FHIR DevDays today at 10:15am ET: 

FHIR from Jupyter

Travel through space and time as we explore FHIR from a Jupyter Notebook. This session walks you through:
- Working with the FHIR Search API
- Exploring FHIR data from Python using pandas
- Exporting Bulk Data to Newline-delimited JSON (NDJSON)
- Converting NDJSON to Parquet using Apache Spark
- Exploring FHIR data from Python using PySpark

We've pushed the corresponding notebooks to github under an open source license at https://github.com/Alvearie/FHIR-from-Jupyter
